This vignette introduces regDIF to the general user by providing common use cases.

## LASSO regularization for evaluating DIF in 2PL-IRT model, large tau parameter --> no DIF effects
```{r,eval=T,message=F,echo=F}
library(regDIF)
head(ida)
item.data <- ida[,1:6]
predictor.data <- ida[,7:9]
fit <- regDIF(item.data = item.data, predictor.data = predictor.data, item.type = "binary", penalty = "lasso", tau = 2)
summary(fit)
```
